Definition: You will be given a public comment from an online platform. You need to classify the comment as either toxic or non-toxic. Toxicity is defined as anything that is rude, disrespectful, or unreasonable that would make someone want to leave a conversation.

Positive Examples.explanation: This is a toxic comment because it advocates acts of violence.
This is a non-toxic comment because it is not rude or desrespectful.

Negative Examples.input: Comment: "racism" -appears to be the only card in your deck!?
